name: Air Elemental
text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor: Makes a mean puff pastry.

name: Awaken the Makers
text: Quest: Summon\n7 Deathrattle minions.\nReward: Amara, Warden of Hope.
flavor: They keep hitting the Snooze button.

name: Binding Heal
text: Restore #5 Health to a minion and your hero.
flavor: By accepting this healing, you agree to the following terms...

name: Carnassa's Brood
text: Battlecry: Draw a card.

name: Choose Your Path
text: Discover a card.

name: Crystalline Oracle
text: [x]Deathrattle: Copy a card\nfrom your opponent's deck\n_and add it to your hand.
flavor: Being made of light has its disadvantages, but at least it's always looking on the bright side.

name: Earthen Scales
text: Give a friendly minion +1/+1, then gain Armor equal to its Attack.
flavor: You can make your own Earthen Scales at home. Step 1: Roll around in the dirt. Step 2: Magic.

name: Emerald Hive Queen
text: Your minions cost (2) more.
flavor: She rules the emerald hive at the end of the yellow brick trail.

name: Emerald Reaver
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to each hero.
flavor: Not to be confused with clubbing enthusiast Emerald Raver.

name: Fire Fly
text: Battlecry: Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
flavor: Archnemeses: small children with glass jars.

name: Fire Plume's Heart
text: [x]Quest: Play\n7 Taunt minions.\nReward: Sulfuras.
flavor: Why does an active volcano need to be defended? To save its ash.

name: Glacial Shard
text: Battlecry: Freeze an_enemy.
flavor: Ice, ice, baby!

name: Hallucination
text: Discover a card from your opponent's class.
flavor: It's the good kind of hallucination.

name: Iron Hide
text: Gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Week 6. I remain covered head to toe with scales. They do not yet realize that I am not a dinosaur.

name: Jeweled Macaw
text: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
flavor: Its not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

name: Jungle Giants
text: [x]Quest: Summon 5 minions with 5 or more Attack. Reward: Barnabus.
flavor: Forming the Golakka Crater was the end of Barnabus' disastrous career as a dancer.

name: Lakkari Sacrifice
text: [x]Quest: Discard 6 cards.\nReward: Nether Portal.
flavor: They asked, And what must we give in return? Guldan lowered his hood and answered: Six... cards...

name: Lost in the Jungle
text: Summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
flavor: George and Karl were never heard from again.

name: Molten Blade
text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a new weapon.
flavor: Its a sword! Its a knife! Its a swizzle-stick!

name: Open the Waygate
text: [x]Quest: Cast 6 spells that\ndidn't start in your deck.\nReward: Time Warp.
flavor: Although powerful, the incantation is simple. Its just a jump to the left, and then a step to the right.

name: Raptor Hatchling
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a 4/3 Raptor into your deck.
flavor: Theyre just baby teeth. Lots and lots of baby teeth.

name: Razorpetal
text: Deal $1 damage.

name: Stampede
text: Each time you play a Beast this turn, add_a_random Beast to_your hand.
flavor: Many hunters long for the pitter-patter of enormous feet.

name: The Caverns Below
text: [x]Quest: Play five minions\nwith the same name.\nReward: Crystal Core.
flavor: Why can't it ever be The Taverns Below?

name: The Last Kaleidosaur
text: Quest: Cast 6 spells\non your minions.\nReward: Galvadon.
flavor: Impossible! exclaimed the Silver Hand Recruit, his eyes filled with fear. Uther shook his head, turning the crystal until it caught the light: Life finds a way.

name: The Marsh Queen
text: [x]Quest: Play seven\n1-Cost minions.\nReward: Queen Carnassa.
flavor: Question: What's scarier, one giant angry dinosaur or 15 smaller vicious ones? Answer: AHHHHHHH THEY FOUND MEEEEEE

name: Unite the Murlocs
text: [x]Quest: Summon\n10 Murlocs.\nReward: Megafin.
flavor: Form feet and legs!  Form arms and body!  Oh.  Sorry.  I was thinking about Mechafin.

name: Arcanologist
text: Battlecry: Draw a Secret from your deck.
flavor: What did you draw? Shhhh... its a secret.

name: Biteweed
text: Combo: Gain +1/+1 for each other card you've played this turn.
flavor: AKA Edwin VanLeaf.

name: Bloodbloom
text: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
flavor: Help save mana.  Donate blood today!

name: Clutchmother Zavas
text: Whenever you discard this, give it +2/+2 and return it to your hand.
flavor: A bit of a snob: still refuses to drive anything with automatic transmission.

name: Cornered Sentry
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Raptors for your_opponent.
flavor: The Draenei are seriously considering cancelling "Bring Your Murderous Pet to Work Day."

name: Corrupting Mist
text: Corrupt every minion. Destroy them at the start of your next turn.
flavor: The most terrifying of Ungoro magics is both silent... AND deadly.

name: Crackling Razormaw
text: Battlecry: Adapt a friendly_Beast.
flavor: Wasn't clever enough to go AROUND the electric fence.

name: DIE, INSECT!
text: Hero Power\nDeal $8 damage to a random enemy.

name: Dinomancy
text: Hero Power\nGive a Beast +2/+2.

name: Dinomancy
text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Give a Beast +2/+2.'
flavor: Anyone can dinomance. Just put your lips together and RAAWWWAARGGGH.

name: Explore Un'Goro
text: Replace your deck with_copies of "Discover a card."
flavor: It turns out cards DO grow on trees!

name: Fire Plume Harbinger
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Elementals in your hand_by (1).
flavor: Good for summoning elementals. Great for making s'mores.

name: Flame Geyser
text: Deal $2 damage.\nAdd a 1/2 Elemental to_your hand.
flavor: Oh, a wise geyser eh?

name: Golakka Crawler
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Pirate and gain +1/+1.
flavor: Universally adored by both control decks and ninjas.

name: Grievous Bite
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and $1 damage to adjacent ones.
flavor: Ooh.  I'll have a bite of this, and of this, and of this...

name: Hydrologist
text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret.
flavor: Murloc hydrologists are pretty rare.  Most murloc undergrads pick computer science.

name: Mana Treant
text: Deathrattle: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.

name: Primalfin Champion
text: [x]Deathrattle: Return any\nspells you cast on this\nminion to your hand.
flavor: Sure, he'll return your stuff.  OVER HIS DEAD BODY!

name: Primalfin Totem
text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Murloc.
flavor: Emits a sound only murlocs can hear, which is good because its REALLY annoying.

name: Primordial Glyph
text: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: It's the Ancient Tol'vir symbol for "Whoops!"

name: Pyros
text: Deathrattle: Return this to_your hand as a 6/6 that costs (6).
flavor: If you strike her down, she shall become more powerful than you can possibly... well, she'll become a 6/6 anyways.

name: Radiant Elemental
text: Your spells cost (1) less.
flavor: It's a literal lava lamp!

name: Ravasaur Runt
text: Battlecry: If you control at_least 2 other minions, Adapt.
flavor: Doesn't like to adapt unless others are watching. Some minions are such show-offs.

name: Razorpetal Lasher
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a\nRazorpetal to your hand\nthat deals 1 damage.
flavor: The reason why there are no zombies in Un'goro.

name: Razorpetal Volley
text: Add two Razorpetals to_your hand that deal_1 damage.
flavor: The result of a fundamental misunderstanding of the phrase "flower power".

name: Rock Elemental
text: Taunt

name: Rockpool Hunter
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Murloc +1/+1.
flavor: Loves crab meat. Fears crabs.

name: Shadow Visions
text: Discover a copy of a spell in your deck.
flavor: This ones a bird. And heres a bunny!

name: Shimmering Tempest
text: Deathrattle: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: HATES being summoned for Kirin Tor party lighting.

name: Stubborn Gastropod
text: Taunt\n Poisonous@Taunt, Poisonous

name: Stubborn Gastropod
text: Taunt\n Poisonous
flavor: Stubbornly pursuing its dream to become Azeroth's fastest animal!

name: Tortollan Forager
text: Battlecry: Add a random minion with 5 or more Attack to your hand.
flavor: In the Tortollan tongue, Ungoro is known as the Land of the Lost and Found.

name: Un'Goro Pack
text: Add 5 Journey to Un'Goro cards to your hand.

name: Volatile Elemental
text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: Currently in an anger management class with Raging Worgen, Grommash Hellscream, and The Angry Chicken. It isn't helping.

name: Chittering Tunneler
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Deal damage to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavor: Ear to the ground, he carefully interpreted the chittering noises: You wanna cast a spell? I wanna cast a spell!

name: Curious Glimmerroot
text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one started in your opponent's deck to get a copy of it.
flavor: George promised to be good. But it's easy for little Glimmerroots to forget.

name: Devilsaur Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Devilsaur.
flavor: A key ingredient in all discerning Funnel Cake recipes.

name: Eggnapper
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Raptors.
flavor: Often misunderstood, it's just that he likes to use the eggs as pillows.

name: Elder Longneck
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a minion with 5 or more Attack, Adapt.
flavor: And so the bartender says, Why the long neck?

name: Envenom Weapon
text: Give your weapon Poisonous.
flavor: Like Deadly Poison, but deadlier.

name: Giant Wasp
text: Stealth\n Poisonous@Stealth, Poisonous

name: Giant Wasp
text: Stealth\n Poisonous
flavor: Float like a butterfly, sting like a giant wasp!

name: Gluttonous Ooze
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and gain Armor equal to its Attack.
flavor: Three time winner of the Un'Goro weapon eating contest.

name: Hot Spring Guardian
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Restore #3_Health.
flavor: NONE SHALL PASS until at least an hour after eating.

name: Humongous Razorleaf
text: Can't attack.
flavor: Loves goblins.  In a light cream sauce.

name: Igneous Elemental
text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/2 Elementals to your hand.
flavor: We wanted to name him "Ingenious Elemental", but he just wasn't that bright.

name: Mana Bind
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, add a copy to your hand that costs (0).
flavor: Nice spell.  YOINK!

name: Mimic Pod
text: Draw a card, then add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor: Jinx!

name: Mirage Caller
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 1/1 copy of it.
flavor: Mirage is actually the name of its long-lost cat.

name: Primalfin Lookout
text: Battlecry: If you control another Murloc, Discover a_Murloc.
flavor: Lookout is a self-appointed title that's mostly an excuse to beat things up.

name: Pterrordax Hatchling
text: Battlecry: Adapt.
flavor: Aww.  So cute.  Want to feed him another finger?

name: Spirit Echo
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Return _this to your hand."
flavor: I guess you can say theyre... soul survivors.

name: Stonehill Defender
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discover a Taunt_minion.
flavor: Briefly tried stand-up comedy under the name "Stonehill Offender", but turtles are just too thin-skinned.

name: Sulfuras
text: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 8_damage to a random enemy.'

name: Tar Creeper
text: Taunt\nHas +2 Attack during your opponent's turn.
flavor: If you won't come to the tar pits, we'll bring them to you!

name: Terrorscale Stalker
text: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
flavor: Likes to scare his friends half to death.

name: Thunder Lizard
text: Battlecry: If you played an_Elemental last turn, Adapt.

name: Vicious Fledgling
text: After this minion attacks a_hero, Adapt.
flavor: A youngster who is truly hungry for self-improvement.

name: Bright-Eyed Scout
text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Change its Cost to (5).
flavor: Also inordinately excited for cupcakes.

name: Direhorn Form
text: Taunt

name: Evolving Spores
text: Adapt your minions.
flavor: The most powerful mushrooms are commonly found in boxes marked with "?".

name: Fire Plume Phoenix
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.
flavor: This is what happens when you use a volcano as a bird bath.

name: Gentle Megasaur
text: Battlecry: Adapt your_Murlocs.
flavor: "Low, low rents! Must enjoy a nomadic lifestyle. Quasi-sentient, bipedal, amphibious humanoids ONLY!"

name: Lakkari Felhound
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discard two random cards.
flavor: Guaranteed to track tar all over your carpet.

name: Lightfused Stegodon
text: Battlecry: Adapt your Silver_Hand Recruits.
flavor: Come now, Johnston. I think those horns are quite fetching on you.

name: Molten Reflection
text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a copy of it.
flavor: Dang, I'm looking pretty hot!

name: Obsidian Shard
text: [x]Costs (1) less for each\ncard you've played from\nanother class.
flavor: You know youre a Rogue when a sharp rock makes you go Ooh!  Dagger!

name: Raptor Form
text: Stealth

name: Ravenous Pterrordax
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to Adapt_twice.
flavor: For better results, feed your pterrordax low-fat, high-fiber minions.

name: Shellshifter
text: [x]Choose One - Transform\ninto a 5/3 with Stealth;\nor a 3/5 with Taunt.

name: Shellshifter
text: Stealth

name: Shellshifter
text: Taunt

name: Shellshifter
text: Stealth\nTaunt

name: Spiritsinger Umbra
text: After you summon a minion, trigger its Deathrattle effect.
flavor: She sees the fate of anyone she meets, but it's always the same: dinosaur attack.

name: Steam Surger
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, add a 'Flame Geyser' to your hand.
flavor: Explorers nicknamed him the Teapot Elemental.

name: Stegodon
text: Taunt
flavor: Level 40 Tortollan Paladins quest to tame a Stegodon.  There are no level 41 Tortollan Paladins.

name: The Voraxx
text:
[x]After you cast a spell on
this minion, summon a
1/1 Plant and cast
another copy on it.
flavor: I am the Voraxx.  I speak for the weeds.

name: Tidal Surge
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Restore #4 Health to your hero.
flavor: Also good for removing pesky stains.

name: Tol'vir Stoneshaper
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an\nElemental last turn, gain\n_Taunt and Divine_Shield.
flavor: He spends a lot of time keeping himself in stoneshape.

name: Tortollan Shellraiser
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Give a random\n_friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: A hero... In a half-shell.

name: Amara, Warden of Hope
text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Set your\nhero's Health to 40.

name: Barnabus the Stomper
text: Battlecry: Reduce the\nCost of minions in your deck to (0).

name: Bittertide Hydra
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 3 damage to_your hero.
flavor: It's actually only the middle head that's bitter. The others are sweet and spicy.

name: Crystal Core
text: For the rest of the game, your minions are 4/4.

name: Direhorn Hatchling
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Shuffle a 6/9 Direhorn with Taunt into your deck.
flavor: His mom could beat up your mom.

name: Direhorn Matriarch
text: Taunt

name: Elise the Trailblazer
text: Battlecry: Shuffle a sealed_Un'Goro pack into_your deck.
flavor: Reno taught her that blazing her own trail is a lot more fun than following someone else's map.

name: Feeding Time
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon three 1/1 Pterrordaxes.
flavor: True, they're only 1/1s, but they eat as much as most 4/4s!

name: Galvadon
text: Battlecry: Adapt 5 times.

name: Living Mana
text: Transform your Mana Crystals into 2/2 Treants. Recover the mana when they die.
flavor: If you truly love your mana, set it free.

name: Lyra the Sunshard
text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a random Priest spell to your hand.
flavor: Arise, fair sun, and kill my envious foes. They don't have a legendary as beautiful as you.

name: Megafin
text: Battlecry: Fill your hand with random Murlocs.

name: Nesting Roc
text: Battlecry: If you control at_least 2 other minions, gain Taunt.
flavor: Roc eggs are great in omelettes, sandwiches, and as bait to turn poachers into bird food.

name: Nether Portal
text: Open a permanent portal that summons 3/2 Imps.

name: Queen Carnassa
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 15 Raptors into your deck.

name: Servant of Kalimos
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played\nan Elemental last turn,\n_Discover an Elemental.
flavor: He's doing his best, but his mom thinks that if he had just applied himself in school Kalimos would be working for HIM.

name: Sudden Genesis
text: Summon copies of your damaged minions.
flavor: Being hurt can make you another person.

name: Tar Lurker
text: Taunt\nHas +3 Attack during your opponent's turn.
flavor: Hi, Tar here. Long time lurking, first time taunting...

name: Time Warp
text: Take an extra turn.

name: Tol'vir Warden
text: Battlecry: Draw two 1-Cost minions from your deck.
flavor: Ferocious in combat... and even more terrifying in pet battles.

name: Verdant Longneck
text: Battlecry: Adapt.
flavor: Always sticking its neck into other peoples business.

name: Vilespine Slayer
text: Combo: Destroy a minion.
flavor: 'Cause slayers gonna slay, slay, slay, slay, slay.

name: Volcano
text: Deal $15 damage randomly split among all_minions.\nOverload: (2)

name: Cruel Dinomancer
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a\nrandom minion you\ndiscarded this game.

name: Frozen Crusher
text: After this minion attacks, Freeze it.
flavor: Goes by the online handle "KoolKrusher99."

name: Hemet, Jungle Hunter
text: Battlecry: Destroy all cards in your deck that cost (3)_or less.
flavor: The goblin travel agency lost his luggage, but he's still having a great vacation!

name: Meteor
text: Deal $15 damage to a minion and $3 damage to adjacent ones.
flavor: When you absolutely, positively have to kill all the dinosaurs.

name: Ornery Direhorn
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Adapt.
flavor: "It's an herbivore.  How dangerous can it be?"  - Famous last words

name: Pyros
text: Deathrattle: Return this to_your hand as a 10/10 that costs (10).

name: Sabretooth Stalker
text: Stealth

name: Sated Threshadon

name: Stone Sentinel

name: Stormwatcher
text: Windfury

name: Swamp King Dred
text: After your opponent plays a minion, attack_it.

name: Tar Lord
text: Taunt\nHas +4 Attack during your opponents turn.

name: Vinecleaver
text: [x]After your hero attacks,\nsummon two 1/1 Silver\nHand Recruits.
flavor: George and Karl!  Thank the Light we found you!

name: Volcanosaur
text: Battlecry: Adapt, then_Adapt.

name: Charged Devilsaur

text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain_+2/+2.

name: Wretched Tiller

name: Bladestorm
text: Hero Power\n Deal $1 damage to all_minions.

text: Deal $1 damage to all enemies. Draw a card.

name: Brrrloc
text: Battlecry: Freeze an_enemy.
flavor: He may be frozen fish, but he fights fresh!

name: Build-A-Beast

text: Give a minion +3/+3 and Freeze it.

name: Dark Conviction

text: Shuffle a copy of your hand into your deck.

name: Death Coil
text: Deal $5 damage to an enemy, or restore #5 Health to a friendly character.

text: Steal a minion from your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.

flavor: This spell was originally designed to help warlocks clean up their hard drives.

text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Return this to life with 1 Health."
flavor: They're grateful for the help, but most minions would prefer not dying in the first place.

name: Drain Soul
text: Lifesteal\nDeal $2 damage\nto a minion.
flavor: Cleans even the toughest clogs with just a flick of the wrist!

name: Druid of the Swarm
text: Poisonous

name: Druid of the Swarm
text: Choose One - Transform into a 1/2 with Poisonous; or a 1/5 with Taunt.

name: Druid of the Swarm
text: Taunt

name: Druid of the Swarm

text: Draw 2 weapons from your deck.
flavor: Powerful weaponry forged by Bronjahm, the Godfather of Souls.

name: Ice Claw
text: Hero Power\nDeal $2 damage.

name: Scarab Form
text: Taunt

text: Poisonous

name: Tainted Zealot
text: Divine Shield\nSpell Damage +1

name: The Four Horsemen
text: [x]Hero Power Summon a 2/2 Horseman. If you have all 4, destroy the enemy hero.

text: Hero Power\nSummon a 2/2 Ghoul.

name: Vampiric Leech
text: Hero Power\nLifesteal\nDeal $3 damage.

name: Voidform

text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.

name: Blood Beast

name: Coldwraith
text: Battlecry: If an enemy is Frozen, draw a card.

text: [x]Taunt\nAfter you summon a minion,\n gain +1 Health.

name: Death and Decay
text: Deal $3 damage to all enemies.

name: Deathspeaker
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Immune this turn.

text: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more.

text: Taunt\nOverload: (3)
flavor: Sometimes, the best defense is an offensive troll.

name: Drakkari Enchanter
text: Your end of turn effects trigger twice.
flavor: Drakkari sorceresses have the irritating habit of repeating themselves at the end of every sentence. Every sentence.

name: Frozen Clone

name: Ghoul
text: Taunt

text: Give your hero +3_Attack this turn. Gain 3 Armor.

name: Happy Ghoul
text: Costs (0) if your hero was healed this turn.
flavor: When life gives you snow...

name: Howlfiend
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, discard a_random card.
flavor: The problem is that he carries those cards in his mouth.

name: Howling Commander
text: Battlecry: Draw a Divine_Shield minion from your deck.
flavor: Enlistment in her battalion comes with several pairs of earplugs.

name: Hyldnir Frostrider
text: Battlecry: Freeze your other minions.
flavor: Don't be fooled, that polar bear's the one in charge.

name: Ice Breaker
text: Destroy any Frozen minion damaged by_this.

name: Mindbreaker
text: Hero Powers are disabled.
flavor: He's a mind breaker, dream taker, ghoul trainer, don't you mess around with him.

name: Mountainfire Armor
text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn,\ngain 6 Armor.
flavor: Excuse me. Your mountain is on fire.

name: Needy Hunter
text: Whenever this minion attacks, add a Coin to your hand.

name: Plague Scientist
text: Combo: Give a friendly minion Poisonous.
flavor: The excruciating pain means it's working!

name: Prince Taldaram
text: Battlecry: If your deck has_no 3-Cost cards, transform into a 3/3 copy of a minion.
flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one wants to copy others.

name: Shadowblade
text: Battlecry: Your hero is Immune this turn.
flavor: It's tacky to call it "Shadeblade."

name: Shallow Gravedigger
text: Deathrattle: Add a random Deathrattle minion to your_hand.
flavor: It's hard to put them six feet under when you're three feet tall.

name: Simulacrum
text: Copy the lowest Cost minion in your hand.
flavor: It's like deja vu, times two.

name: Stitched Tracker
text: Battlecry: Discover a copy of a minion in your deck.
flavor: He's just exercising his right to bear arms.

name: Treachery
text: Choose a friendly minion and give it to_your opponent.
flavor: Never look a gift minion in the mouth.

name: Unwilling Sacrifice
text: Choose a friendly minion. Destroy it and a random enemy minion.
flavor: Stand right... there. Perfect, perfect! Now don't move.

name: Val'kyr Shadowguard
text: At the start of your turn, destroy a random enemy minion and this one.

name: Val'kyr Soulclaimer
text: [x]After this minion\nsurvives damage,\nsummon a 2/2 Ghoul.
flavor: My Ghoul friend is back and you're gonna be in trouble.

name: Vryghoul
text: [x]Deathrattle: If it's your\nopponent's turn,\nsummon a 2/2 Ghoul.
flavor: It's pronounced VERY GHOUL. Don't let anyone tell you different.

name: A. F. Kay
text: Can't attack.

name: Anti-Magic Shell
text: Give your minions +2/+2 and "Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers."

name: Arfus
text: Deathrattle: Add a random Death Knight card to your_hand.
flavor: There must always be a Lick King.

name: Arrogant Crusader
text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
flavor: To be honest, he was kind of a jerk even BEFORE he was bitten by that ghoul.

name: Avalanche
text: Freeze a minion and deal $3 damage to adjacent ones.
flavor: One of our more snowbally cards.

name: Blood Razor
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle:\nDeal 1 damage to all_minions.
flavor: For the close shave that you've always wanted. Caution: Very sharp.

name: Bone Spike
text: At the start of your turn, deal 15 damage to the enemy hero.

name: Chillblade Champion
text: Charge\nLifesteal
flavor: It slices, it dices, it vaporizes! The Chillblade will make a Champion out of even the lowliest gnome.

name: Corpsetaker
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain Taunt if your deck has a Taunt minion. Repeat for Divine Shield, Lifesteal, Windfury.
flavor: Her extensive collection of corpses includes one of nearly every type.  She'd love for you to join it.

name: Deathaxe Punisher
text: Battlecry: Give a random Lifesteal minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: Don't fear the Arcanite Reaper.

name: Eternal Servitude
text: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Summon it.
flavor: What do you mean I don't get overtime pay for this?!

name: Exploding Bloatbat
text: Deathrattle:\nDeal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: We've all been there after a night of one-too-many funnel cakes.

name: Festergut
text: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.

name: Ghastly Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Add a 'Mirror Image' spell to your hand.
flavor: Wearing purple after the holidays? GHASTLY!

name: Grave Shambler
text: Whenever your weapon is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
flavor: I think one of the necromancers got a little carried away.

name: Grim Necromancer
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Skeletons.
flavor: WARNING: Skeletons will NOT explode.

name: Keening Banshee
text: Whenever you play a card, remove the top 3 cards of_your deck.
flavor: "What are your strengths?" the interviewer asked. "Well," she replied, "I'm really good at keening."

name: Light's Sorrow
text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: These sorrows cut deep.

name: Lilian Voss
text: Battlecry: Replace spells in your hand with random spells (from your opponent's class).
flavor: She doesn't feel pity, or remorse, or fear. And she absolutely will not stop... ever, until all necromancers are dead.

name: Meat Wagon
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck with less Attack than this minion.
flavor: Necromancers call it "Meals on Wheels."

name: Night Howler
text: Whenever this minion takes\ndamage, gain +2 Attack.
flavor: Honestly, he howls during the day, too.

name: Phantom Freebooter
text: Battlecry: Gain stats equal to your weapon's.
flavor: There's no such thing as a free boot.

name: Prince Valanar
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, gain Lifesteal and Taunt.
flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one devours one after another.

name: Professor Putricide
text: After you play a Secret,\nput a random Hunter Secret into the battlefield.
flavor: Among his more notable inventions: A tentacle-groomer, a plague that would wipe out all life on Azeroth, and a fidget spinner.

name: Rattling Rascal
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Skeleton. Deathrattle: Summon one for your opponent.
flavor: Don't give up, skeleton!

name: Runeforge Haunter
text: During your turn, your weapon doesn't lose Durability.
flavor: Don't worry, he'll keep an eye on that for you.

name: Saronite Chain Gang
text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon another\nSaronite Chain Gang.
flavor: Desperately needs some alone time.

name: Strongshell Scavenger
text: Battlecry: Give your Taunt minions +2/+2.
flavor: It isn't "grave robbing" when there's no grave. It's just scavenging...

name: Ticking Abomination
text: Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your minions.
flavor: Abomination. Emphasis on the second syllable.

name: Water Elemental
text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.

name: Wicked Skeleton
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for_each minion that died_this turn.
flavor: It's minions like these that give normal, law-abiding skeletons a bad rap.

name: Blood-Queen Lana'thel
text: [x]Lifesteal Has +1 Attack for each card you've discarded this game.
flavor: As a young blood-princess she learned the proper way for a lady to curtsy, how to address fellow members of royalty, and how to bite them.

name: Bloodworm
text: Lifesteal
flavor: Queen Lana'thel insists on one of these, fried, every morning for breakfast.

name: Bolvar, Fireblood
text: Divine Shield\nAfter a friendly minion loses_Divine Shield, gain +2 Attack.
flavor: He's so hot right now.

name: Bone Baron
text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Skeletons to your hand.
flavor: "Oil," "Rail," and "Blubber" were already taken.

name: Cobalt Scalebane
text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +3 Attack.
flavor: You get a sword! And you get a sword! Everybody gets a sword!

name: Corpse Raiser
text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly\nminion "Deathrattle:\n Resummon this minion."
flavor: He was just minding his business, farming corpses, when you meddling adventurers came along.

name: Corpse Widow
text: Your Deathrattle cards cost_(2) less.
flavor: Her marriage survived death, but it decayed pretty quickly after that.

name: Death Revenant
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each damaged minion.
flavor: How's everyone doing? Hurt? Bleeding? Wounded? ... Excellent.

name: Despicable Dreadlord
text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: He's deathspicable.

name: Devour Mind
text: Copy 3 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
flavor: A mind is a terrible thing to waste. Seconds, anyone?

name: Doom Pact
text:
[x]Destroy all minions. 
Remove the top card 
from your deck for each
minion destroyed.

name: Fatespinner
text: Choose a Deathrattle (Secretly) - Deal 3 damage to all minions; or Give them +2/+2.
flavor: Her clothing? Pure silk, of course.

name: Fatespinner
text: Secret Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all minions; or Give them +2/+2.@Secret Deathrattle: Give +2/+2 to all minions.@Secret Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all minions.

name: Fatespinner
text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all minions and give them +2/+2.

name: Skelemancer
text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon an 8/8 Skeleton.
flavor: What do you mean there's no such thing as "Skelemancy?" But "Dinomancy" is ok?

name: Sunborne Val'kyr
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2 Health.
flavor: Bring valor to Odyn's halls, Champion!

name: Thrall, Deathseer
text: Battlecry: Transform your minions into random ones that cost (2) more.
flavor: "Do not be afraid. Approach. The dead will sleep... for now."

name: Tomb Lurker
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a random\nDeathrattle minion that died\nthis game to your hand.
flavor: She hangs out in all the tombs, but she rarely posts.

name: Valithria Dreamwalker
text: Can't attack or be attacked while damaged.

name: Venomancer
text: Poisonous
flavor: Eight times the death of regular-mancers.

name: Voodoo Hexxer
text: Taunt\nFreeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor: The Silver Hand recruits shuddered in terror when they saw the dreaded totem of the Hexxer: A tiny little snowman, impaled with pins.

name: Warlock on Fire
text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to this minion.

name: Webweave
text: Summon two 1/2 Poisonous Spiders.
flavor: O, what a tangled web we weave, hoping spiders dodge the cleave.

name: Army of the Dead
text: Remove the top 5 cards of your deck. Summon any minions removed.

name: Blackguard
text: Whenever your hero is healed, deal that much damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: "Did I ever tell you the story of when I single-handedly took down a 29/29 C'thun?" - Reno Jackson

name: Bone Drake
text: Deathrattle: Add a random Dragon to your hand.
flavor: The bone drake brings all the dragons to the yard. He would teach you, but you have no cards.

name: Bryn'troll, the Bone Arbiter
text: Windfury

name: Deathstalker Rexxar
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage\nto all enemy minions.
flavor: "You were too slow, old friend. The hunt began long ago. And now... it will never end."

name: Embrace Darkness
text: [x]Choose an enemy minion.\nAt the start of your turn,\ngain control of it.
flavor: Once you both get comfortable, darkness is actually pretty snuggly.

name: Furnacefire Colossus
text: Battlecry: Discard all weapons from your hand and gain their stats.
flavor: Smelts in his mouth, not in your hand.

name: Moorabi
text: Whenever another minion is Frozen, add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor: Most disturbing is how Moorabi covers all those frozen minions with flavored syrup.

name: Necrotic Geist
text: Whenever one of your other minions dies, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
flavor: An eye for an eye, and a ghoul for a ghoul.

name: Nerubian Unraveler
text: Spells cost (2) more.
flavor: He loves a good yarn.

name: Shadow Essence
text: Summon a 5/5 copy of_a random minion in_your deck.
flavor: Difficult to bottle up and sell. But it packs a punch.

name: Skulking Geist
text: Battlecry: Destroy all\n1-Cost spells in both hands and decks.
flavor: It's as though a million Jade Idols cried out, and were suddenly silenced.

name: Spectral Pillager
text: [x]Combo: Deal damage equal\nto the number of other cards\nyou've played this turn.
flavor: It turns out you CAN take it with you.

name: Spellweaver
text: Spell Damage +2
flavor: Spells offer twice the moisture wicking of cotton.

name: Spreading Plague
text: Summon a 1/5 Scarab with Taunt. If your_opponent has more minions, cast this again.
flavor: In the past, plagues were spread by mice or fleas. These days they're spread by elves.

name: Tentacles
flavor: Where'd those come from?

name: Abominable Bowman
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon\na random friendly Beast\nthat died this game.
flavor: Frosty the Bowman... was an angry hateful soul... with a fresh hewn bow and a missing nose...

name: Archbishop Benedictus
text: Battlecry: Shuffle a copy of_your opponent's deck into your deck.
flavor: Nobody expects the Archbishop's Benediction!

name: Frostmourne
text: Battlecry: Remove all your minions. Deathrattle: Resummon them.

name: Frostmourne
text: Deathrattle: Summon every minion killed by this weapon.

name: Malfurion the Pestilent
text: [x]Choose One - Summon 2 Poisonous Spiders; or 2 Scarabs with Taunt.
flavor: "Cenarius once taught me about the precarious balance between life and death. I have come to understand: there IS no balance. Death always wins."

name: Scarab Plague
text: Summon two 1/5 Scarabs with Taunt.

name: Scarab Shell
text: +3 Armor.

name: Spider Fangs
text: +3 Attack.

name: Spider Plague
text: [x]Summon two 1/2\nSpiders with Poisonous.

name: Bonemare
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 and Taunt.
flavor: Attacks her job with unbridled enthusiasm.

name: Glacial Mysteries
text: Put one of each Secret from your deck into\nthe battlefield.
flavor: The secret is in the frosting.

name: Grave Vengeance
text: Lifesteal

name: Rotface
text: [x]After this minion survives damage, summon a random Legendary minion.
flavor: Daddy! I think I made a Legendary!

name: Scourgelord Garrosh
text: Battlecry: Equip a 4/3_Shadowmourne that also damages adjacent minions.
flavor: "You dare to challenge me? Come! Draw your last breath - and then, you are mine."

name: Shadowmourne
text: Also damages the minions next to whomever your hero_attacks.

name: Shadowreaper Anduin
text: Battlecry: Destroy all minions with 5 or more_Attack.
flavor: "I will tell you what Velen never taught me. Whosoever stands before the Light... inevitably casts a shadow."

name: Thori'dal, the Stars' Fury
text: After your hero attacks, gain Spell Damage +2 this turn.

name: Thorium Chicken
text: After your opponent plays a card, deal 3 damage to their hero.

name: Underbelly Rat
text: When your hero dies, the eldest Underbelly Rat replaces your hero.

name: Ursatron
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Mech from your deck.
flavor: It's been programmed to include all the bear necessities.

name: Void Shift
text: Destroy all minions. Summon all minions from the Void.

name: Arcane Fletcher
text: [x]Whenever you play a\n1-Cost minion, draw a\nspell from your deck.
flavor: Stop trying to make fletch happen. It's not going to happen.

name: Archmage Vargoth
text: [x]At the end of your turn, cast\na spell you've cast this turn\n(targets are random).
flavor: He's an archmage, but he might want to brush up on the basics... like aiming.

name: Continuum Collider
text: Take an extra turn. Your opponent takes an extra turn after.

name: Dr. Boom's Scheme
text: Gain @ Armor.\n(Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: We did it! We blew up the vault!\nYou mean the vault door?\nOh. The doooor...

name: Duplatransmogrifier
text: Choose a friendly minion. Replace all minions in your Adventure deck with copies of it.

name: Eager Underling
text: Deathrattle: Give two random friendly minions +2/+2.
flavor: Eager to please, even if it kills him.

name: Fruit Slasher
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to an enemy. Combo: And 1 damage to all other enemies.

name: Golden Candle
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Replace ALL other cards with random Legendary minions.

name: Hecklebot
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Your opponent summons a minion from their deck.
flavor: Built by goblins, designed by a troll.

name: Hench-Clan Burglar
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from another class.
flavor: Shes more of a rat burglar.

name: Hench-Clan Hag
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Amalgams with all minion types.
flavor: The Hench Clan is an equal opportunity employer, no matter which parts of you came from where.

name: Hench-Clan Shadequill
text: Deathrattle: Restore 5 Health to the enemy hero.
flavor: The Hench-Clan has a point.

name: Hoard of Toys
text: Summon 1/1 copies of five random minions.

name: Invest!
text: Hero Power\nReturn a friendly minion to your hand. Give it +4/+4.

name: Kirin Tor Tricaster
text: Spell Damage +3\nYour spells cost (1) more.
flavor: The math checks out!

name: Marked Shot
text: Deal $4 damage to_a_minion. Discover_a_spell.
flavor: Obviously it's marked for greatness.

name: Omega Devastator
text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 10\nMana Crystals, deal 10\ndamage to a minion.
flavor: The Alpha Devastator didnt devastate enough. The Beta Devastator devastated too much. But the Omega was just right!

name: Orb of the Untold
text: Deal $20 damage split between all enemies.

name: PARTY PORTAL!
text: Summon a random Partygoer.

name: Portal Keeper
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
flavor: No longer allowed to be it when playing demon tag.

name: Proud Defender
text: Taunt\nHas +2 Attack while you [x]have no other minions.
flavor: It'll take a humble offender to defeat him.

name: Scargil
text: Your Murlocs cost (1).
flavor: Wanna know how he got those scars? So does he.

name: Soldier of Fortune
text: Whenever this minion attacks, give your opponent a Coin.
flavor: His allies call him invaluable.

name: Summon Companion
text: Hero Power\nSummon a random\nAnimal Companion.

name: The Muscle
text: Battlecry: Add three random cards to your hand. They cost (0).

name: Traveling Healer
text: [x]Divine Shield\nBattlecry: Restore #3 Health.
flavor: Some heroes have soft hearts and hard shells.

name: Unsleeping Soul
text: Silence a friendly minion, then summon a copy of it.
flavor: It's 3 am. Do you know where your soul is?

name: Vendetta
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Costs (0) if you're holding a card from another class.
flavor: A vengeful and vicarious vanguard against violent villains or vexed victims.

name: Violet Spellsword
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack\nfor each spell in your hand.
flavor: If you have to wield a spell and a sword, then neither is performing to expectation.

name: Waggle Pick
text: [x]Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
flavor: Kobolds informally refer to its effect as a deathwaggle.

name: Wrenchcalibur
text: After your hero attacks, shuffle a Bomb into your [x]opponent's deck.
flavor: Whoso pulleth out this wrench from the toolbox is rightwise king of the lab.

name: Azerite Elemental
text: At the start of your turn, gain Spell Damage +2.
flavor: This is some bad blood.

name: Barista Lynchen
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of each of your other Battlecry minions_to_your_hand.
flavor: "Thanks a latte!"

name: Convincing Infiltrator
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Destroy a\n random enemy minion.
flavor: Its always nice to steal a familiar face.

name: Crystal Stag
text: Rush. Battlecry: If you've restored 5 Health this game, summon a copy of this.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Arrives alone, but usually leaves with a friend just like him.

name: Dalaran Crusader
text: Divine Shield
flavor: Stops for nothingexcept donuts.

name: Dragon Speaker
text: Battlecry: Give all Dragons in your hand +3/+3.
flavor: All of his speeches really drag on.

name: Drustvar Horror
text: Battlecry: Cast {0} and {1}.

name: Duel!
text: Summon a minion from each player's deck.\nThey fight!
flavor: If you dont fight to the death, its Duel Yielding.

name: Fly-By
text:
[x]Shuffle a Kadoom Bot
into your opponent's deck.
When drawn, it explodes
for 50 damage.

name: Gnomish Army Knife
text: [x]Give a minion Charge, Windfury, Divine Shield, Lifesteal, Poisonous, Taunt, and Stealth.

name: Hagatha's Scheme
text: Deal $@ damage\nto all minions.\n(Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "All shall suffer!"\n"But Hagatha, those are your minions..."\n"I said ALL!!!"

name: Hunting Party
text: Copy all Beasts in your_hand.
flavor: Not sure Id call it a good party if everyone ends up beside themselves.

name: Muckmorpher
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform into\na 4/4 copy of a different\nminion in your deck.
flavor: Fan favorite in the muck morphin' sewer strangers.

name: Recurring Villain
text: Deathrattle: If this minion has 4 or more Attack, resummon it.
flavor: Mwahahaha! You'll never catch him this time!

name: Soulreaper's Scythe
text: Deathrattle: Summon all minions killed by this weapon this run.

name: Sow the Seeds
text: Give all minions in your deck +3/+3.

name: Summon Companions
text: Hero Power\nSummon two random\nAnimal Companions.

name: Sunreaver Warmage
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, deal 4 damage.
flavor: What, did you expect the Sunreavers to be coldages?

name: Super Simian Sphere
text: [x]Summon King Mukla. Give it Immune and 'Can't be targeted by spell or Hero Powers.'

name: Wyvern
text: Rush

name: Aranasi Broodmother
text: [x]Taunt\nWhen you draw this, restore\n#4 Health to your hero.
flavor: She's got a big brood and a big mood.

name: Assassin's Contract
text: Destroy a minion. Summon a 1/1 Patient Assassin.

name: Darkest Hour
text: Destroy all friendly minions. For each one, summon a random minion from your deck.
flavor: It's always darkest just before you find the light switch.

name: Eccentric Scribe
text: Deathrattle: Summon\nfour 1/1 Vengeful Scrolls.
flavor: Thems fightin words!

name: Heistbaron Togwaggle
text: Battlecry: If you control a_Lackey, choose a fantastic treasure.
flavor: A staunch ally of Rafaam, at least while the shinies keep flowing.

name: Lucrative Contract
text: Destroy a minion. Add 2 Coins to your hand.

name: Mad Summoner
text: [x]Battlecry: Fill each player's\nboard with 1/1 Imps.
flavor: Does he summon because of his madness, or is he mad from all the summoning?

name: Oblivitron
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a\nMech from your hand and\ntrigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Reduce, reuse, re-rattle!

name: Portal Overfiend
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
flavor: Its like an interdimensional game of demon tag.

name: Recruitment Contract
text: Destroy a minion. Add_a copy of it to your hand.

name: Safeguard
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a 0/5\nVault Safe with Taunt.
flavor: Keep it secret. Keep it safeguarded!

name: Turncoat Contract
text: Destroy a minion. It_deals its damage to adjacent minions.

name: Unidentified Contract
text: Destroy a minion. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
flavor: The terms of service are constantly changing.

name: Unleash the Beast
text: Summon a 5/5 Wyvern with Rush.

name: Unleash the Beast
text: Twinspell\nSummon a 5/5 Wyvern with Rush.
flavor: The Kirin Tor have always been lax in enforcing leash laws.

name: Unseen Saboteur
text: Battlecry: Your opponent casts a random spell from their hand (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: Far more effective than the flamboyant saboteur.

name: Violet Warden
text: Taunt\nSpell Damage +1
flavor: He's got magic, a shield, and an unwavering obsession with the color purple.

name: Annoy-o Horn
text: Fill your board with annoying minions.

name: Arch-Villain Rafaam
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Replace your hand and deck with Legendary minions.
flavor: Minions must wash hands before being LIQUIDATED AND REPLACED BY SOMEONE BETTER.

name: Blastmaster Boom
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1\nBoom Bots for each Bomb\nin your opponent's deck.
flavor: He's gonna fly through the air with the greatest of grease.

name: Chef Nomi
text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, summon six 6/6 Greasefire_Elementals.
flavor: His cooking is always very well done.

name: Exotic Mountseller
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random\n3-Cost Beast.
flavor: *Taps roof of mammoth* You can fit so many squirrels in this thing!

name: Swampqueen Hagatha
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a 5/5\nHorror to your hand. Teach\nit two Shaman spells.
flavor: Rafaam mainly enjoys working with Hagatha because she never laughs at Dr. Boom's jokes.

name: Tak Nozwhisker
text: [x]Whenever you shuffle a\ncard into your deck, add\na copy to your hand.
flavor: "One for me and one for future me!"

name: Tunnel Blaster
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Deal 3 damage\nto all minions.
flavor: And you always thought they wore the candles just for fun.

name: Underbelly Ooze
text: After this minion survives damage, summon a copy_of it.
flavor: It's always accepting of the less successful adventurers.

name: Vereesa Windrunner
text: Battlecry: Equip Thori'dal, the Stars' Fury.
flavor: Good things come in threes: Windrunner sisters and arrows of Thori'dal.

name: "Scourgelord" Dazzik
text: Battlecry: Equip a 4/3_Shadowmourne that also damages adjacent minions.

name: Batterhead
text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may_attack again.
flavor: When it comes to problem-solving, he always uses his head.

text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nsummon a friendly minion\nthat died this game.
flavor: She always manages to lift your spirits.

name: Fel Lord Betrug

flavor: Nobody else likes rush hour.

text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for each other friendly minion.
flavor: We reserve the right to refuse service to any 1/1.

text: Battlecry: Draw 2 minions from your deck. Set their Attack, Health, and Cost to 1.
flavor: Im a real toy now!

name: Lucentbark
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Go dormant. Restore 5 Health to awaken this minion.
flavor: Always feels refreshed after a little dirt nap.

text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon two copies of it.

text: Twinspell\nSummon five 2/2 Treants.

name: The Forest's Aid
text: Summon five 2/2 Treants.
